thread.title: The future of hotels!
thread.title_full: The future of hotels! - Review of hub by Premier Inn Spitalfields, Brick Lane, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 678DPCD
title: The future of hotels!
text: Booking, checking in and out, and staying at the hub is a pleasure. The staff are helpful, the quality of materials and technology is very high and the value for money is outstanding. Where else can you get a room of this quality in London for just over Â£50? Although there are no tea/coffee - making facilities in the room, unlimited free tea / coffee is available from reception. I have already booked my next stay here.
